data.title: Duel of Fire (1962)
data.meta_description: Antonio Franco's sister is been murdered by a gang of bandits. He swear vengeance and manage to infiltrate the gang to find the murders.
data.text:
Umberto Lenzi's prototype for the spaghetti western, 1963 adventure film Duel of Fire, hits all the right marks for the conventions of the genre. The only thing that's really off is the setting.

It's Italy, 1855, and Fernando Lamas is Antonio. His sister has been murdered. After killing the man he suspects organized the horrible act, he infiltrates the outlaw gang to try and take them out that way.

Liana Orfei is adorable, and plays Maruzza, the squeeze of one of the bandits, and does the expected dance scene in the middle of the film, though it's much goofier than usual. Lisa Gastoni is Leonore, an intrepid reporter who ends up in the crossfire.

The film builds to a downbeatâ€¦
